comments.name: Md. Faisal Karim
comments.text: Dr. Smith was incredibly helpful. She took the time to understand my concerns and provided practical solutions. The video consultation was smooth and professional.

comments.name: Shamima Akter
comments.text: I was skeptical about online therapy at first, but Dr. Johnson made me feel comfortable right away. The platform is easy to use and the sessions are just as effective as in-person visits.

comments.name: Tanvir Hasan Rafi
comments.text: The convenience of being able to schedule appointments and attend sessions from home has been a game-changer for me. Dr. Williams is knowledgeable and caring.
